Conquer the grids and be the best player in the world!

There are a lot of changes in this update. From rework of the UI to new playable map. We even have improved the way of matching, letting players find others easier through the new Lobby finder.

We also added this Announcement system, in which we are able to announce new content, winners of events, and share important and detailed information with the players.

Changes:
New CyberRoad Stage!
A Lobby finder, where you can now check which lobby is being played or is waiting for players.
Some UI Rework
An announcement page, to be able to stay up-to-date with the new content and important information
The new CyberRoad stage is a difficult stage that requires you to check from many directions at all times. There is not a spot to take a break, you are constantly crossing these dangerous roads. It is available as standard or deathmatch in offline mode, and deathmatch only for now in online mode.

We want players to be able to enjoy new stages and also old stages by increasing the chanses of matching each other. And this is one first step to achieve a better overall online experience. The new lobby finder displays the most concurrent lobbies in order, making easier to find other players that are trying to play a match.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Hyper Update!
A new game mode to test your skills!
Changes:
-Hyper mode! A new game mode where your speed is increased by default, requiring precise and agile controls is the key for the victory.
-New daily missions. Now there is a set of missions that you can complete daily to get more coins!
-Many bug fixes. Including better support for tablets.
